title: 玩家登陆完之后没有任何权限
author: jzk520
txt_content:
本帖最后由 梓 于 2020-4-14 23:26 编辑 

如图，，，玩家登陆完之后没有任何权限，只能手动一个一个的给权限，，这样太麻烦了。各位大佬有已经配置好的权限插件吗。。。拜托了





file_1586338314000.jpg
(198.58 KB, 下载次数: 0)




下载附件


2020-4-8 17:31 上传








如图

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
bjzk520 发表于 2020-4-8 18:13
裂开了。。。plugins\GroupManager\worlds\world里的user.yml 删除了Essentials删除干净了AuthMe也删除干 ...
那你直接 /mangaddp default essentials.build吧

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
groups.yml中 Builder组下的default设为true  Default组下的default设为false 重启服务器 即可

https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... 124&pid=8064108

replies.author: jzk520
replies.txt_content:
折叠 发表于 2020-4-8 17:35
groups.yml中 Builder组下的default设为true  Default组下的default设为false 重启服务器 即可

https://ww ...

replies.author: jzk520
replies.txt_content:
折叠 发表于 2020-4-8 17:35
groups.yml中 Builder组下的default设为true  Default组下的default设为false 重启服务器 即可

https://ww ...

[spoiler]
# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&5'
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - +vanish.effects.toggle.all
    - -vanish.effects.*
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&4'
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&2'
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&c'
      suffix: ''
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    - essentials.build
    - essentials.tpa
    - essentials.tpaccept
    - sms.remove
    - sms.set
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      build: false
      prefix: '&e'
      suffix: ''

[/spoiler]

bjzk520 发表于 2020-4-8 17:48
[/spoiler]
我说/list截图 如果有玩家还在default组的话 手动用/manuadd 玩家ID Builder命令移动过去就行了

按上面说的操作过的话 新玩家注册默认是Builder组 不用担心

折叠 发表于 2020-4-8 18:02
删除plugins\GroupManager\worlds\world里的user.yml 重启服务器
裂开了。。。plugins\GroupManager\worlds\world里的user.yml 删除了Essentials删除干净了AuthMe也删除干净了，然后我登录注册，还是这个样子。。。。
而且我还在default组的。。。= =怎么会这样啊

replies.author: jzk520
replies.txt_content:
折叠 发表于 2020-4-8 18:02
删除plugins\GroupManager\worlds\world里的user.yml 重启服务器

# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&5'
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - +vanish.effects.toggle.all
    - -vanish.effects.*
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&4'
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&2'
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&c'
      suffix: ''
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    - essentials.build
    - essentials.tpa
    - essentials.tpaccept
    - sms.remove
    - sms.set
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default

    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default

对了大佬，怎么才能关掉这个限制啊？玩家登录时间有点短，怎么样才能调长一点呢？

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
bjzk520 发表于 2020-4-8 18:22
对了大佬，怎么才能关掉这个限制啊？玩家登录时间有点短，怎么样才能调长一点呢？
 ...
图片里写的是注册上限 config中maxRegPerIp后的数值调高即可

登录时间 找到timeout 改大就行 1=1s

replies.author: jzk520
replies.txt_content:
折叠 发表于 2020-4-8 18:24
图片里写的是注册上限 config中maxRegPerIp后的数值调高即可

登录时间 找到timeout 改大就行 1=1s ...
十分感谢耐心解答！
